mapper.insert: INSERT INTO o_jmt_review (ijmt, iuser, j_ctnt, j_star) VALUES ( #{ijmt}, #{iuser}, #{j_ctnt}, #{j_star})
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.u_nm AS username FROM o_jmt_review A LEFT JOIN o_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ijmt = ${ijmt} ORDER BY icmt
select * from o_jmt_review where iuser=#{iuser} and ijmt = #{ijmt}
mapper.delete: delete from o_jmt_review where icmt = ${icmt} and iuser = ${iuser}
